mapper.select: SELECT version_id , block_id , major , minor , created_date , last_updated_date , creator , last_updater FROM SKILL_RES_V1_VERSION WHERE version_id = #{versionId, typeHandler=com.ebson.skillserver.typeHandler.UUIDTypeHandler}
SELECT version_id , block_id , major , minor , created_date , last_updated_date , creator , last_updater FROM SKILL_RES_V1_VERSION
